metadata.Title: CVE-2022-27404 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: FreeType commit 1e2eb65048f75c64b68708efed6ce904c31f3b2f was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow via the function sfnt_init_face.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> vulnerable code was actually introduced in commit https://gitlab.freedesktop.org/freetype/freetype/-/commit/63765a8f (version 2.8), the commit in the description is the commit used to sync and test the reproducer.

criterions.comment: freetype: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'reached end-of-life').
